content.prompt: This version of Diego Velázquez’s Las Meninas can be attributed to Pablo Picasso for which of the following reasons?

choices.label: Because of the inclusion of the artist’s self-portrait
Because of the representation of deep interior space
Because of the use of diffused light

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
